item.title: Hugo with GitHub Pages
item.description: Before writing a blog, there needs to be a blog. As a good a place as any to start…. Hugo with a Theme I already had a quick-start Hugo site for testing a local k3d build pipeline and it was while creating this I stumbled upon the integration with github actions. This time around I decided to give it a go….hosting on github I went slightly beyond the quick-start and used Hugo Modules for importing a theme, following the steps for the Ananke theme.
